crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'resource' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'name': doc.name}); }

listing_by_id.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'resource' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, doc.name); }

listing_active_by_rules.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'resource' || ! doc.enabled || doc.pvt_deleted) return; for (var i in doc.rules) emit([doc.weight_cost, doc.rules[i]], {'id': doc._id, 'gateways': doc.gateways, 'caller_id_options': doc.caller_id_options, 'flags':doc.flags || []}); }
